CSGO is very fun, easy to learn. The game is easy to learn but harder to master. Also a lot of hackers now in this game due to the game being free to play now which I believed was a bad idea. I would recommend it but to keep in mind once you start playing you will face a lot of hackers before achieving a renk in MM. :)

CS:GO jest spoko strzelanką, którą już chyba każdy zna albo chociaż kojarzy. Gwarantuje Ci, że żadna inna gra nie dostarczy Ci tyle wkur*** co właśnie CS:GO a nasi przyjaciele z Rosji tylko dostarczą Ci dodatkowych wrażeń i przy okazji nauczysz się podstaw rosyjskiego, jak się wyzywa matki swoich teammateów albo graczy ze strony enemy, oczywiście nie wspominając o możliwości przetestowania swojego skilla przeciwko cheaterowi, który nagle niespodziewanie i tak całkiem przypadkowo przeskanuje Cię przez 15 ścian trafiając prościutko w łeb ^^ Polecam grę wszystkim graczom, którzy nie boją się nowych wyzwań lub chcą zaznać małej odmiany :D Gwarantuje wam, że będziecie się dobrze bawić!
this game is good but a lot of hackers are trying to ruin this games fun pls do something and add a better anticheat so to avoid hackers!
if uwant to rage play this game

One of the best competitive games, Counter Strike has been in the spotlight of Esports for years. Even on a local level, CS:GO remains one of the community's favorite games. It has been the target of rage and heartbreak, and has seen the glory of radical plays and clutch moments. There's a reason why so many people have stayed with Counter Strike for so long; the amount of dedication and skill required to play is rewarding every step of the way. And with professional influencers and role models, from years past to more recent, such as 2016 Cloud9's Stewkie2k to 2020 Astralis' dev1ce, CS:GO inspires many players to become better and to have fun. The history of CS:GO is evident whether you're a new player or have been playing since you were 14 years old, (and had dreams of going pro), and there is much to be appreciated about this game.
